name: Ygpl.tools
body:
Provide free software component (copyleft) on SAP ABAP, by using [https://code.google.com/p/zaplink/ ZAPLINK framework]


_`GPL is `*`natural`*`, GPL is `*`good`*`,`

`Not everybody does it`

`But everybody should`

`GPL is something that `*`we should do`*` `

`GPL is something for `*`me and you`*` `_

Thanks to [http://www.georgemichael.com/index.php?module=discography&discography_item_id=77&discography_tag=Singles George M.] for the original "lyrics"

=Support us=
YGPL is free softwares, if you like them, feel free to support us.


*EUR* : [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=BXFCE2CVRCDAY https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG_global.gif]
- OR - *USD* : [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=SBD53GLL3PH5Q https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG_global.gif]

=News=
  * 2012-12-04 : [DBA_Cockpit  DBA Cockpit (Oracle) => V0.0]
  * 2012-11-27 : [AdvancedSGEN upgrade in Advanced SGEN => V0.2]
  * 2011-12-12 : [Multi_Thread Framework for mutli processing => V0.0]
  * 2011-12-12 : [Data_Store Framework to store data => V0.0]
  * 2011-11-03 : [AdvancedSGEN Fix in Advanced SGEN => V0.1]
  * 2011-03-28 : [Unlock_on_Commit Framework to unlock on commit V0.0]
  * 2011-03-28 : [ABAPObjectTools Convert Class to Interface V0.0]
  * 2011-01-27 : [WhereUseIndexUpdater Mass Use Case index updater V0.0]
  * 2011-01-27 : [AdvancedSGEN Advanced SGEN V0.0]

[Tools Get all tools list]

[Tutorials Get all tutorials list]

=Star us=
You use or like some of theese tools ? Please *Star this project* to let us known we're not "working" for no one... :-)

=Join us=
If you decide to use one of theese tools (not for test purpose), please join the [http://groups.google.com/group/ygpl/ yGPL Network] and let us know for each tools what could be improved and how theese tools have been usefull for you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
